Reviews.Title: Well Made, Looks Real
Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: Very real and has made my existing video security system appear more expansive. Good addition to the overall security system. I definitely recommend adding a sign that informs people of the camera's presence. It looks real and provides an excellent visible warning with the blinking red light. I would highly recommend this unit for anyone not wanting to invest in a real unit and save some money.

Reviews.Title: Gets the job done!!
Reviews.Author: vwbugman
Reviews.Content: Totally gets the job done. Just make sure that when you mount it to something that you put a wire coming out from the camera, otherwise, people that are smart will figure it out. The red light has been blinking for over a month and haven't had to change the battery. It definitely makes people think twice before trying to break in.

Reviews.Title: Missing Parts,Dome,Nuts?
Reviews.Author: Nor'easter
Reviews.Content: The camera looks very real however when you get one that has no dome,nuts,missing parts it's very disappointing. I tried to do a replacement however amazon will only allow refunds?. So I'm going to place a second order and when it arrives i will place a update on this item. I wish it was QC before it was shipped out :(

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: Roy
Reviews.Content: The price of this fake security camera is fair and it has great feature. I would recommend it to anyone wanting good quality at a low price.

Reviews.Title: Good fake camera. Good Price
Reviews.Author: restaurant owner
Reviews.Content: For the price, this camera is really good.Especially at night, the camera looks real with its  blinking lights.Quality product!

Reviews.Title: THERE IS NO FLASHING LIGHT!
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Otherwise looks real; Flashing light would be much more believable.Would rate higher if they were to allow exchange for working light.I will try to fix the problem myself, otherwise I will take the hit and learn from it.

Reviews.Title: Fake dome dummy cameras
Reviews.Author: Kris Ammerman
Reviews.Content: These dummy cams are really cool, I believe they reduce crime based on the crook thinks that they are real cameras. The price is good, shipping was fast.

Reviews.Title: decent
Reviews.Author: Dana Rocco Macri
Reviews.Content: Looks real enough. The red light is okay also. Installation is like simple as hell since you are just screwing this into the wall.. the sticker was the best part of this package I think.. I have had more people deterred by the sticker than actually seeing the camera.

Reviews.Title: Cool looking, and effective
Reviews.Author: A. B. (male)
Reviews.Content: I have 2 of these on my home, and often get asked about them. They really can fool the fools who might try to come onto your property uninvited.

Reviews.Title: Looks, works good.
Reviews.Author: nictoanamide
Reviews.Content: Looks real, works good. What else can you say?  It will fool a thief. I also got a sign which says video surveilance.

Reviews.Title: I Feel Safer
Reviews.Author: Midsomer Mama
Reviews.Content: It looks just like the real thing, It was easy to install, just 3 little screws. Easy to change the batteries. It takes 2 AA batteries which are always on hand at least at my house. You can use it with or without the red light. It looks so real that my neighbors seriously accused me of spying on them.

Reviews.Title: Excellent purchase
Reviews.Author: R. Narimatsu
Reviews.Content: This dome camera looks like a real security camera, and I'm able to change the angle of the flashing light too.  Also, a security sticker comes with every camera.  I would purchase this camera again.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Dummy Surveillance Camera
Reviews.Author: K. Weaver
Reviews.Content: Camera arrived on time as promised.  Packaging was excellent.  This camera is so realistic that no one can tell it is not the real thing.  Very satisfied.  Would recommend highly.

Reviews.Title: Looks ok, easily broken.
Reviews.Author: Reading Nut
Reviews.Content: I ordered three of these for a property I am renting temporarily. I have wireless cameras indoors, but didn't want to spend money to install exterior cameras on a property that isn't my own.The look fairly realistic, but one of the three I purchased was broken before I opened the box. Amazon will of course refund the money, but the quality of the camera is obviously not that great. It was of course very cheap!

Reviews.Title: Looks authentic and easy to install
Reviews.Author: The Kodachromeguy
Reviews.Content: I was a bit dubious about a fake dome camera, but I installed it on my garage overlooking the driveway, and the other day, the teenager who does yard work commented on how we had a new video system.  So it fools some people.  Inexpensive and worthwhile.

ProductInfo.Features:
Fake dummy camera with built-in continuous flashing light
Increase your security at a fraction of the cost of real camera
Operated by 2 AA batteries ( not included)
The security sticker included
Wall/ceiling mounted, 180 degree pan/tilt
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu CCTV Dome Fake Dummy Surveillance Security Camera with Blinking Flashing Light WL1
